channel.title: Translation of the home page into Spanish
channel.description: I think it is a good idea to have a version of the homepage of whonix [https://www.whonix.org/](https://www.whonix.org/) in Spanish, since it has been working in advertising by different means mostly Hispanic, I promise to do the work. What do you think @Ego ?

item.title: Translation of the home page into Spanish
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Sure, thank you very much. You may push translations onto this Github repository: https://github.com/EgoBits1/Whonix-Website/tree/Preparation-for-Translation/content

The folders represent the respective pages and have subcategories for each potential language. The translation file format can be plain txt, though markdown would be prefered.

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
item.source: Translation of the home page into Spanish

item.title: Translation of the home page into Spanish
item.dc:creator: Jaime_Antonio
item.description:
I think it is a good idea to have a version of the homepage of whonix https://www.whonix.org/ in Spanish, since it has been working in advertising by different means mostly Hispanic, I promise to do the work.
What do you think @Ego ?
